verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: plans] [ARG1: to follow through on his campaign threat to pull out of the landmark nuclear accord with Iran] , [ARGM-ADV: according to two people familiar with his thinking] , [ARGM-ADV: dealing a profound blow] ...
